name: R-G-B
description:
R-G-B is a fast-paced color matcher where the goal is simple: match the color shown on screen! It might sound easy but colors get more complex as you play and the time limit gets shorter and shorter. Eventually you're fighting against the clock as even a single mistake is unforgivable!

I made this game in the span of 3 days as a side project. The inspiration for a game like this came to me and I wanted to test myself to see if I could turn a color matching game concept into something fun. This is the result of that inspiration.
